DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test effectiveness physician profile care coordination diabetes resource nurse improve quality diabetes care .
DOC.brief_title: Improving Diabetes Care : Effectiveness Physician Profiling Care Coordination Diabetes Resource Nurse
DOC.detailed_description: HealthTexas Provider Network primary care practice least 10 Medicare diabetes patient age 65 randomize one 3 intervention arm : physician feedback process measure use Medicare claim data ( `` Claims '' ) ; feedback Medicare claim data plus clinical measure medical record abstraction ( `` Claims+MR '' ) ; type feedback plus practice-based DRN ( `` DRN '' ) . For 12 month prior intervention 12 month post-intervention , performance data diabetes related process care ( annual HbA1c testing , annual LDL cholesterol screening , annual hypertension screening , annual eye , foot , renal assessment ) patient outcome ( HbA1c level , LDL cholesterol level , blood pressure ) collect medical record abstraction Medicare claim data . Pre-post change score compare intervention arm examine effectiveness physician profile care coordination diabetes resource nurse .
